sig_info: While Malice is active: Gain up to +40 to 100.01% Poison duration based on how long the fight has gone on. Max Bonus after 100 seconds.
When Malice enters Cooldown, gain a Regeneration Buff, recovering 49.91 to 174.67 Health over 13 seconds.

ALWAYS ACTIVE: Unique physiology grants Immunity to Bleed, Power Drain and Power Burn effects.
PERSONAL FURY BUFFS: Unless otherwise stated, King Groot’s Fury Buffs each provide +18 Attack Rating and last 13 seconds.
Whenever King Groot receives a Debuff, he will spend 1 personal Fury Buff after 0.50 seconds to Purify that Debuff.
MALICE - PASSIVE: King Groot starts the fight with a Malice Passive, which grants 1 Fury Buff(s). Malice lasts as long as King Groot has at least 1 Personal Fury Buff remaining.
While Malice is active: Gain up to +100% Fury Buff Potency based on how long the fight has gone on. Max Bonus after 100 seconds.
When Malice ends, it goes on Cooldown for 13 seconds.
WHILE MALICE IS ON COOLDOWN: Any attack from either Champion has a 20% chance to grant 1 Fury Charge. When Cooldown ends, gain 1 Fury Buff for each Charge acquired and re-enter Malice.
Each time King Groot’s attack is Evaded, Auto-Blocked, or Misses gain 2 Fury Charge(s). Cooldown 2 seconds.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Pause all Poison and Armor Break Debuffs on the opponent for 3 seconds.
Malice: Spend 1 Fury Buff to instead Pause for 6 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Inflicts up to 3 Armor Break Debuffs, with each having a 100% chance to activate, removing an Armor Up Buff and reducing Armor Rating by 218.18 for 15 seconds. Max Stacks: 10. These Armor Breaks also reduce future Armor Up Buff Potency by 10%.
Malice: Spend 1 Fury Buff to make the Armor Break indefinite.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Each hit of King Groot’s caustic breath deals 42 direct damage. This damage is tripled against #Robot Champions.
100% chance to inflict a Poison Debuff, reducing healing effects by 30% and dealing 120 direct damage over 10 seconds.
Malice: Spend 1 Fury Buff to increase the Poison duration by +100%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to gain a Regeneration Buff, recovering 142.6 Health over 3 seconds. This Regeneration Buff is Paused while King Groot is Heal Blocked.
Malice: Spend 1 Fury Buff to increase the Buff duration by 50%.
